booking-pending-desc: Start packing your bags - it's time to hit the road! We've attached your official receipt and the voucher for your purchased activity along with this email.
cancel-booking-title: Your booking has been canceled successfully.
cancel-booking-desc: We understand that plans change, and some tough decisions need to be made sometimes. Don't worry, we're always looking forward to your next booking!
cancel-refund-title: Your booking has been canceled, the refund is being processed.
cancel-refund-desc: We're really sorry to see you cancel your booking - but we understand - plans change. We've begun processing your refund - it should take 20-25 days for the funds to reach your account.
delayed-voucher-desc: The voucher mailed earlier is the confirmation for booking from our supplier. The attached voucher in this mail is the final voucher for you to product at the tour or the activity counter.
payment-successful-desc: We've included the details of your booking here for safe keeping. We'll also send a separate email with your official receipt and vouchers within the next 30 minutes.
request-refund-desc:
Details for this booking made by {{z_fname}} are included below.
Please process the relevant refund amount
contact-us-msg: In case of any emergency, please reach out to our support team.
